changes.change: - You can now resize window more freely, and resize from all 4 corners (applies to windows on the external display only)\n- Add a switch to control the visibility of resize corners\n- Fix status bar and red bar issues on the external display
- Add switches to control extra keyboard buttons and force Medusa on games\n- Fix UI issues with home button iPhones\n- Fix truncated app name in app switcher
Unlock floating keyboard (iOS 16+ only for now)
